title: Soen ni Natte Ita Osananajimi to Seki ga Zengo ni Natta - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Awkward Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Cute Story   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Past Trauma
author: Takayama Hidenori   鷹山英則
description: Kashiwagi Kota has a childhood friend named Kirishima Kana.  One day during the second grade of middle school, Kana told Kota 'Don't talk to me for the rest of your life', and then the two of them became distant.  However, now in his second grade of high school, Kana is sitting in front of Kota.  Kota thought, 'Well, I guess I won't be able to talk to you.'>
